description.en: $MYH is a utility token developed on the Tezos network. It is used within the MoneyHero ecosystem. The MoneyHero academies for financial education offer paid content, e.g. video courses. The over 7,000 members of the community can decide whether they want to pay for access in regular FIAT currencies or lock their MoneyHero tokens for a certain amount of time in a staking pool. While the tokens are staked, users receive rewards AND free access to premium content.
